oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Interpolation with bilinear differential forms
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: PENDHARKAR, ISHAN
RAPISARDA, PAOLO
PILLAI, HARISH K
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: autonomous agents
computation theory
computer simulation
recursive functions
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We present a recursive algorithm for modeling with bilinear differential forms. We discuss applications of this algorithm for interpolation with symmetric bivariate polynominals, and for computing storage functions for autonomous systems.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Proceedings of the 44th IEEE Conference on Decision and Control and the European Control Conference, Seville, Spain, 12-15 December 2005, 2893-2898
